string.text: You said you can reload this flamethrower? I think it's out of fuel...
Yeah, no problem man. You got any fuel? Jeez, don't say that I gotta look for it myself! I'm up for it, but it's gonna cost you 30,000Ru. And only after a drink. And I mean a REAL drink...
More vodka? You're going to drink the Zone dry, buddy. Look for it without me. And just so you know, 30,000 is more than the flamethrower cost, so to hell with it...
Vodka will be the death of you, my friend. Here's the fuel, and a bottle of the Zone's finest. Just make it quick
Hey, I'm not a robot! Give me about half an hour
Okay, but please, as quickly as possible...
I don't have any fuel. Here's 30,000 and some vodka. But please work first, and drink later, okay?
Well... Thanks. Don't worry, a day should be enough for this job.
A full day? I thought you were an artisan? More like a piss-artisan. Sorry, I don't have that kind of time...
Hey, don't be in such a rush! It's not that simple. Come back another time!
